product_name: Altus RM40 / Alex X101 Rear Wheel
long_description: Just right for the first-time cyclist, this replacement rim offers durability, performance and control. Features an Altus RM40 hub, and is compatible with 8-, 9- and 10-speed cassettes. Wear-indicator line tells you when it's time to replace the wheel. Recommended 19mm rim tape sold separately.
short_description: Just right for the first-time cyclist, this replacement rim offers durability, performance and control.
